title: The Awakening of Ren Crown
description: How far would you go to save someone you love?At the magic world's most elite school, there is something peculiar about Ren Crown's power. Even amid an eclectic student body, she sticks out—and the wrong people have started to notice.Her paintbrush brings objects to life—why not her twin brother, too? But even in a world where layers of magic create entire worlds on top of our own, some rules should never be broken.Unfortunately, evil will stop at nothing to use Ren and her unimaginable ability.With the help of the most brilliant minds on campus, Ren will risk everything to master her power and fight back—forcing her to choose how far she is willing to go for the ones she loves."A strong heroine and incredible world building make this a must read series."-Barbara Freethy, #1 NYT Bestselling Author
author: Anne Zoelle
